titleStmt.title: The crib of ioy containing spirituall exercise, for Christmasse. S. Steuen. S. Iohn. Innocents. Circumcision. Epiphanie.
Crib of joy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for Christopher Purset, dwelling neare Staple Inne in Holborne, at the signe of Marie Magdalens Head,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 20514 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Staple Inne in Holborne, at the signe of Marie Magdalens Head
